classdata.name: Gunslinger
classdata.description: For those who skip the questions and shoot first, the Gunslinger is loaded with an arsenal of weapon damage and ammo-boosting perks to mow down the dead.

perks.name: Gimme a Reason
perks.description: Start with Frag Grenade and Compact SMG. Movement has no effect on weapon accuracy, recoil effect also reduced

perks.name: Swapping Mags II
perks.description: Reload speed increased by 10% on primary weapons

perks.name: Fire in the Hole
perks.description: Frag Grenade can kill 25% more targets (base: 14)

perks.name: Impact Grenades
perks.description: Frag Grenades explode on impact. They deal 100% more damage but have 50% smaller explosion radius

perks.name: Power Nap
perks.description: Unequipped weapon automatically reloads after 7 seconds

perks.name: Special mag
perks.description: Penetration of all weapons is increased by 1 for 5 seconds after killing by grenade

perks.name: Swapping Mags!
perks.description: Reload speed increased by 25% on all weapons

perks.name: Front Line Supply
perks.description: Headshots made with primary or secondary weapons automatically restore 5% rounds to the magazine

perks.name: Adrenaline
perks.description: Reloading a weapon with less than 25% ammo in the magazine provides a 50% reload speed boost for 5 seconds

perks.name: Re-filling
perks.description: When reloading a fully unloaded primary weapon, the magazine fills up by an additional 15% of its size

perks.name: Heavy Metal
perks.description: Start with improved MAG5 Machinegun that deals 50% more damage, and has 50% more ammo. All MAG5 machinegun pickups also improved

perks.name: Gunner
perks.description: Start with Sporting Carbine PAC-15

perks.name: This is My Rifle
perks.description: Start with ARK-103 Assault Rifle

perks.name: S890
perks.description: Start with an S890 Combat Shotgun

perks.name: Seek and Destroy
perks.description: All active special zombies within a radius of 20 meters will be automatically marked

perks.name: Swapping Mags III
perks.description: Reload speed increased by 15% on secondary weapons

perks.name: Bounty Hunter
perks.description: Deal 25% more damage to special zombies

perks.name: Wheatgrass
perks.description: Health increased by 25%

perks.name: Sleight of Hand
perks.description: Switch weapons 150% faster

perks.name: Sort it all out
perks.description: Emptying the magazine of the primary weapon loads the secondary weapon with explosive rounds

perks.name: Gun Fanatic
perks.description: Draining primary and secondary weapons' magazines automatically reloads primary weapon

perks.name: Concentration
perks.description: Killing 5 zombies consecutively with only headshots grants temporary health boost (cooldown 30 seconds)

perks.name: Judo
perks.description: When pinned down by usual or special zombies you will automatically rise up and push your attackers back (cooldown 180 seconds)

perks.name: Encore
perks.description: Instead of becoming incapacitated, you grand 75% temporary health boost and keep going (cooldown 180 seconds)

perks.name: Welcoming Committee
perks.description: Stationary machinegun ammo increased by 25% for all teammates

perks.name: S890 Shorty
perks.description: Start with a S890 Shorty in your secondary weapon slot

perks.name: Senjata
perks.description: Start with a Senjata PDW in your secondary weapon slot

perks.name: Bad odor
perks.description: When killing a special zombie, there is a chance of dropping a primary weapon (cooldown 180 seconds)

perks.name: My Bad
perks.description: Deal 50% less friendly fire damage to your teammates

perks.name: Deep Pockets II
perks.description: Carried ammo capacity for primary and secondary weapons increased by 10%

perks.name: Deep Pockets
perks.description: Carried ammo capacity for primary and secondary weapons increased by 25%

perks.name: Action Hero
perks.description: When you become the last of your team still standing you gain ability to shoot with your primary and secondary weapons without spending rounds in its magazines for 7 seconds

perks.name: Free Refill
perks.description: Restore 3% of primary weapon ammo for each kill made with equipment

perks.name: The more, the merrier
perks.description: Carried ammo capacity for primary and secondary weapons is increased by 5% for the entire team

perks.name: Work Belt
perks.description: Max number of Frag Grenades increased to 3

perks.name: Pocket Factory
perks.description: You won't be able to pick equipment bags on the mission, but your equipment will be constantly regenerating (150 seconds to replenish to maximum)

perks.name: Headhunter Reward
perks.description: Killing 5 zombies consecutively with only headshots refills one equipment charge (cooldown 15 seconds)

perks.name: It's not over
perks.description: When you become the last of your team still standing your equipment is fully refilled (cooldown 180 seconds)

perks.name: Annihilator
perks.description: Primary, secondary and heavy weapons deal 15% more damage

perks.name: Switcheroo
perks.description: Switching to primary or secondary weapons increases firearm damage by 50% for 5 seconds

perks.name: Thrifty
perks.description: Reloading a weapon with less than 25% ammo in the magazine provides a 50% firearm damage boost for 3 seconds

perks.name: I'm not alone
perks.description: Firearm damage increased by 10% for you and your team

perks.name: War Face
perks.description: Killing 25 zombies in rapid succession grants 50% firearm damage boost to entire team for 20 seconds

perks.name: Fire in The Hole II
perks.description: Frag Grenade can kill 20% more targets (base: 14)

classdata.name: Hellraiser
classdata.description: Enough explosives can solve any problem! Hellraisers come armed with explosive tools for effective crowd control.

perks.name: Demoman
perks.description: Start with C4, Shotgun and Hailstorm MGL

perks.name: Throwing Arm II
perks.description: Throw distance of a C4 increased by 25%

perks.name: Throwing arm
perks.description: Throw distance of a C4 increased by 50%

perks.name: Here Kitty
perks.description: C4 will attract zombies for 5 seconds after being planted but can kill 35% less targets (base: 14)

perks.name: Not Today
perks.description: You may become incapacitated 1 additional time before dying

perks.name: Welcome Mat
perks.description: Upon trigger Claymores will attract zombies for 3 seconds before explosion. Start with Claymores

perks.name: Green Fingered
perks.description: Planting speed of Claymores is increased by 50%. 25% chance to plant the Claymore at no cost to your equipment. Start with Claymores

perks.name: Welcoming Committee
perks.description: Any mortar used by you or teammates can kill 25% more targets (base: 40)

perks.name: Unshakeable
perks.description: Self-inflicted explosive damage reduced by 100%

perks.name: Directed Blast
perks.description: You deal 100% more damage to zombies with all explosives

perks.name: Nimble Thumbs
perks.description: All shotguns' reload speed increased by 50%

perks.name: Demolition Squad
perks.description: Explosive equipment can kill 25% more targets. Applies for the whole team

perks.name: Sleight of Hand
perks.description: Switch weapons 25% faster

perks.name: Bounty Hunter
perks.description: Deal 25% more damage to special zombies

perks.name: Wheatgrass
perks.description: Health increased by 25%

perks.name: Walk Softly
perks.description: Start with a S890 shotgun

perks.name: Tooled Up
perks.description: Increase Claymore capacity to 4 and C4 capacity to 3

perks.name: Pickpocket
perks.description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession refills one equipment charge (cooldown 60 seconds)

perks.name: I’ll Take That
perks.description: Killing a special zombie restores one equipment charge (cooldown 60 seconds)

perks.name: Free Refill I
perks.description: Restores 1% of primary weapon ammo for each kill made with equipment

perks.name: Free Refill II
perks.description: Each kill made with equipment restores 1 round to your primary weapon magazine

perks.name: Third Hand
perks.description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession instantly reloads your primary weapon

perks.name: Hollywood
perks.description: Explosive and fire damage dealt to yourself and your teammates reduced by 30%

perks.name: Directed Blast II
perks.description: Your explosives can kill 10% more targets

perks.name: Scorched Earth
perks.description: Claymore and C4 explosions will set the nearby area on fire

perks.name: Deep Pockets
perks.description: Carried ammo capacity for heavy weapon increased by 35%

perks.name: Hole Punch
perks.description: Shotgun range increased by 50%

perks.name: Senjata
perks.description: Start with a Senjata PDW in your secondary weapon slot

perks.name: Thumper
perks.description: Start with a Thumper GL in your secondary weapon slot

perks.name: Heavy Rain
perks.description: Start with improved Hailstorm MGL that does 50% more damage, and has 50% more ammo. All Hailstorm MGL pickups for you also improved [base: 8 ammo]

perks.name: Knock Knock
perks.description: Start with a Breaching Charge

perks.name: Job Satisfaction
perks.description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession grants a temporary health boost

perks.name: Predator
perks.description: Killing special zombies boosts firearm damage by 50% for 10 seconds

perks.name: Technician
perks.description: C4, Claymore Landmines and MGL can kill 25% more targets

perks.name: Thumper II
perks.description: Carried ammo capacity for Thumper GL increased by 1

classdata.name: Medic
classdata.description: Sometimes the best way to fight the undead is keeping your teammates from becoming one of them. Armed with a Stim Pistol, Medics can heal fellow survivors from a distance and help keep the chaos under control.

perks.name: Booster Shot
perks.description: Start with a Stim Pistol, Compact SMG and free Medkit. Using Medkit on a teammate will also apply 25% of its effect to you

perks.name: Painkiller II
perks.description: Stim Pistol effects last 25% longer

perks.name: Doctor in the House
perks.description: Medkits heal 10% more (base: 70%)

perks.name: Triage
perks.description: Apply Medkits 50% faster [base: 4 seconds]

perks.name: Sugar Coated
perks.description: Healing a teammate with a Medkit also grants them a temporary health boost

perks.name: Patch Up
perks.description: Restore 30% health to a teammate after reviving them (base: 20%)

perks.name: Paramedic
perks.description: Revive speed increased by 50%

perks.name: Pick Me Up
perks.description: When you revive a teammate, both of you gain temporary health boost

perks.name: Big Pharma
perks.description: Max number of Stim Pistol charges increased to 4 [base: 3 charges]

perks.name: Painkiller
perks.description: Stim Pistol gives 25% more temporary health and its effects last 50% longer

perks.name: Empathy
perks.description: Using the Stim Pistol on a teammate will also apply 50% of its effect to you

perks.name: Tenacity
perks.description: All incapacitated team members will stay alive for 30% longer (base: 40 seconds)

perks.name: Triage II
perks.description: Apply Medkits 25% faster [base: 4 seconds]

perks.name: Bounty Hunter
perks.description: Deal 25% more damage to special zombies

perks.name: Wheatgrass
perks.description: Health increased by 25%

perks.name: Navy Seal
perks.description: Start with SMG TMP5

perks.name: Efficiency
perks.description: 30% chance of using a Medkit without depleting your supply

perks.name: Good Karma
perks.description: Using Medkit on a teammate will also apply 50% of its effect to you

perks.name: Combat Medic
perks.description: Kill 15 zombies in rapid succession gives 50% chance to receive a Medkit (cooldown 180 seconds)

perks.name: Free Hugs
perks.description: 25% chance of using the Stim Pistol without depleting its charge

perks.name: Pickpocket
perks.description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession refills one equipment charge (cooldown 20 seconds)

perks.name: I'll Take That
perks.description: Killing a special zombie restores one equipment charge (cooldown 30 seconds)

perks.name: Fighting Chance
perks.description: Using the Stim Pistol on a teammate who is pinned will get them to their feet

perks.name: Remote Healthcare
perks.description: Stim Pistol range increased by 25%

perks.name: Forgive and Forget
perks.description: Friendly fire damage reduced by 25% for all team members

perks.name: In the Zone
perks.description: Using a Stim Pistol or Medkit adds a 50% firearm damage boost for 10 seconds

perks.name: Fighting Fit
perks.description: Firearm damage increased by 25% when your whole team have more than 50% health

perks.name: Battle Surgeon
perks.description: Stim Pistol heals 10% of health in addition to the boost effect

perks.name: Emergency Rescue
perks.description: When your health drops below 25%, you gain temporary health (cooldown 180 seconds)

perks.name: Secret Ingredient
perks.description: Stim Pistol grants additional masking effect lasting 5 seconds

perks.name: Lobotomy
perks.description: Restore 2 rounds in magazine for each headshot made with SMG

perks.name: Swapping Mags!
perks.description: SMGs' reload speed increased by 25%

perks.name: Adrenaline
perks.description: Reload speed increased by 50% when health is below 35%

perks.name: Doctor's Bag
perks.description: Medkits used by you and your teammates restore 10% more health

perks.name: Navy Seal II
perks.description: SMG range increased by 25%

classdata.name: Fixer
classdata.description: When versatility in any situation is the highest priority, the Fixer is there for you, starting out with an explosive ammo case and several teammate ammo-restoring perks.

perks.name: Mule
perks.description: Start with a Supply Bag and Scout Rifle. Increase carried ammo capacity for primary and secondary weapons by 10% for all teammates

perks.name: Knock Knock II
perks.description: 10% chance of using Breaching Charge without spending it

perks.name: Kickback
perks.description: When a teammate uses your Supply Bag there is a 20% chance you will also gain explosive ammo

perks.name: Armory
perks.description: Using a Supply Bag gives a 20% chance to restore one equipment charge. But the bag owner can only restore his equipment when someone else gains this benefit from his bag

perks.name: Stand by Me
perks.description: Increases firearm damage by 100% for 10 seconds when reviving or unpinning a teammate

perks.name: Night Owl
perks.description: Masking Grenades grant an additional temporary health boost. Start with Masking Grenades

perks.name: Side Effects
perks.description: Masking Grenade gas is lethal to zombies. Start with Masking Grenades

perks.name: Give 'em Hell
perks.description: Reviving a teammate grants explosive ammo for both of you

perks.name: Knock Knock
perks.description: You start with a Breaching Charge

perks.name: Paramedic
perks.description: Revive speed increased by 100%

perks.name: Cloakroom
perks.description: Reviving a teammate grants masking effect for 3 seconds for both of you

perks.name: Please Stand Up
perks.description: If everyone in a team is incapacitated or pinned by a zombie then the Fixer is able to stand up (cooldown 60 seconds)

perks.name: Paramedic II
perks.description: Revive speed increased by 25%

perks.name: My Round I
perks.description: Increase carried ammo capacity for primary and secondary weapons by 10% for you and all teammates

perks.name: Wheatgrass
perks.description: Health increased by 25%

perks.name: Gunner
perks.description: Start with Sporting Carbine Pac-15

perks.name: One for the Road
perks.description: Max Masking Grenade and Supply Bag capacity increased to 2. However Masking Grenade effect duration decreased by 3 seconds and Supply Bag contains 25% less explosive ammo

perks.name: Pickpocket
perks.description: Kill 15 zombies in rapid succession refills one equipment charge (cooldown 90 seconds)

perks.name: Scavenger
perks.description: Killing special zombie restores one equipment charge (cooldown 90 seconds)

perks.name: Instant Replay
perks.description: Anyone that uses your supply bag restores 20% of their primary weapon ammunition (base 10%)

perks.name: Under the Table
perks.description: Anyone entering Masking Grenade gas cloud restores 10% of primary weapon ammo

perks.name: Go Get 'Em
perks.description: Reviving a teammate will restore 25% of primary weapon's ammunition for you and your teammate

perks.name: Efficiency
perks.description: Supply bag contains 25% more explosive ammo. Masking grenade effect duration increased by 2 seconds

perks.name: My Round III
perks.description: Carried ammo capacity increased for primary and secondary weapons by 5% for you and all teammates

perks.name: Lightning Hands
perks.description: All semi automatic rifles’ reload speed increased by 25%

perks.name: Power Shot
perks.description: All semi automatic rifles gain increased penetration

perks.name: Casull 6
perks.description: Start with a Casull 6 in your secondary weapon slot

perks.name: Fourth of July
perks.description: Your Supply Bag can be used 1 more time(s) before depleting (base 4 uses)

perks.name: Shadow Walker
perks.description: Masking Grenade effect duration increased by 2 seconds (base 6 seconds)

perks.name: Darkness Falls
perks.description: Masking Grenade gas cloud duration is increased by 7 seconds (base 5 seconds)

perks.name: My Round II
perks.description: Increase carried ammo capacity for heavy weapons by 10% for all teammates

perks.name: Bandolier
perks.description: Mortar and Stationary machinegun ammo capacity increased by 25% for all team. Durability of defenses increased by 25% for all team [base: 4 Mortar ammo, 200 machinegun ammo]

perks.name: The Big Five 0
perks.description: Start with improved BF25 Payload Rifle that deals 50% more damage and has 50% more ammo. All BF25 Payload Rifle pickups for you also improved [base: 6 ammo]

perks.name: Corporate Power Nap
perks.description: Unequipped weapon automatically reloads every 10 seconds for all teammates

perks.name: Bounty Hunter
perks.description: Deal 10% more damage to special zombies

classdata.name: Slasher
classdata.description: For warriors with a sense of elegance, the best way to kill is with your trusty blade. Slashers have perks that increase melee damage and effectiveness while their armed tasers deliver electrifying results.

perks.name: Shock Troops
perks.description: Start with Stun Gun and Compact SMG. Melee strikes damage two targets and do twice more damage when you're not tired. Melee attacks are not slower when tired

perks.name: Juiced Up II
perks.description: Stun Gun effect duration increased by 15%

perks.name: Crowd Control
perks.description: Push radius from melee attacks increased by 50%

perks.name: All Elbows
perks.description: Movement speed penalty when zombies are very close reduced by 100%

perks.name: Rooted
perks.description: You can never be pinned down by usual zombies (does not affect special zombies)

perks.name: Juiced Up
perks.description: Stun Gun effect duration increased by 100%

perks.name: Zeus
perks.description: Increase Stun Gun range by 50% and target count to 20 (base range: 12 m, base target count: 15)

perks.name: High Voltage
perks.description: Stun Gun damage Increased by 150%

perks.name: Bullet-dodger
perks.description: Take 100% less friendly fire from bullets while performing melee attacks

perks.name: Nimble
perks.description: Take 50% less damage while performing melee attacks

perks.name: With My Last Breath
perks.description: Melee strikes damage 2 more targets when health is below 35%

perks.name: Slice and Dice
perks.description: You and all teammates can perform more melee strikes (+2) before becoming tired

perks.name: Zeus II
perks.description: Increase Stun Gun range by 15% [base: 12 meters]

perks.name: Trophy Hunter
perks.description: Deal 25% more damage to special zombies

perks.name: Wheatgrass
perks.description: Health increased by 25%

perks.name: Silent Killer
perks.description: Start with a TMP5 SMG with silencer upgrade

perks.name: Vigour
perks.description: Killing 10 zombies in rapid succession with a melee weapon grants temporary health boost (cooldown 30 seconds)

perks.name: Cloak and Dagger
perks.description: Killing 10 zombies in rapid succession with a melee weapon grants a masking effect (cooldown 30 seconds)

perks.name: Third Hand
perks.description: Killing 5 zombies with melee strikes in rapid succession instantly reloads your primary weapon

perks.name: Heavy Metal I
perks.description: Starts with improved Forrest Warrior Chainsaw deals 50% more damage and has 50% more fuel. All Forest Warrior Chainsaw pickups for you also improved [base: 8 fuel]

perks.name: Heavy Metal II
perks.description: Starts with improved Taiga-12 Heavy Assault Shotgun that deals 25% more damage and has 25% more ammo. All Taiga-12 Heavy Assault Shotgun pickups for you also improved [base: 50 ammo]

perks.name: Battle Cry
perks.description: Automatically stand up from being pinned after 5 seconds

perks.name: Executioner
perks.description: Perform 1 more melee strike before becoming tired. Melee damage increased by 50%

perks.name: Executioner III
perks.description: Perform 1 more melee strike before becoming tired

perks.name: Shock Therapy
perks.description: You will not become fatigued when melee attacking zombies electrified by the Stun Gun

perks.name: Samurai
perks.description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession allows you to hit 1 more target per melee strike for 10 seconds

perks.name: Bloodlust
perks.description: Killing special zombies with a melee weapon will increase firearm damage by 100% for 15 seconds

perks.name: Spare Batteries
perks.description: Max capacity for Stun Gun charges increased to 4 [base: 83 charges]

perks.name: Pickpocket
perks.description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession refills one equipment charge (cooldown 60 seconds)

perks.name: Loan Shark
perks.description: Killing a special zombie gives a 50% chance to restore one charge to your equipment

perks.name: Flash Sale
perks.description: Using the Stun Gun restores 1% of your primary weapon's ammunition for every target you stun.

perks.name: Swapping Mags!
perks.description: SMGs' reload speed is increased by 25%

perks.name: Adrenaline
perks.description: Reload speed increased by 50% when health is below 35%

perks.name: Blade Master
perks.description: Melee strikes damage 1 more target

perks.name: Nimble II
perks.description: Take 10% less damage while performing melee attacks

classdata.name: Exterminator
classdata.description: Fire is the answer! Armed with Molotov cocktails and increased fire damage, the Exterminator just wants to watch the undead burn.

perks.name: Firestarter
perks.description: Start with Molotov and Shotgun. You deal 25% more damage during swarm attacks

perks.name: Wheatgrass II
perks.description: Health increased by 5%

perks.name: Pyromaniac
perks.description: Molotov's fire damage increased by 50%

perks.name: Hangover
perks.description: Molotovs burn 75% longer

perks.name: Crowd Control
perks.description: Push radius from melee attacks increased by 50%

perks.name: Rage Mode
perks.description: When pinned down by usual or special zombies you will automatically rise up and push your attackers back (cooldown 300 seconds)

perks.name: All Elbows
perks.description: Movement speed penalty when zombies are very close reduced by 100%

perks.name: Rooted
perks.description: You can never be pinned down by usual zombies (does not affect special zombies)

perks.name: Dragon Hide
perks.description: Fire resistance increased by 100%

perks.name: Heavy Metal
perks.description: Start with improved RPGL4 that deals 100% more damage. All RPGL4 pickups for you also improved

perks.name: Heavy Metal II
perks.description: Start with improved Taiga-12 Heavy Assault Shotgun that deals 25% more damage, and has 25% more ammo. All Taiga-12 Heavy Assault Shotgun pickups for you also improved

perks.name: Bandolier
perks.description: Mortar and Stationary machinegun ammo capacity increased by 25% for all team. Durability of defenses increased by 25% for all teammates

perks.name: Bullet Rain II
perks.description: Shotgun and semi automatic weapons reload speed increased by 10%

perks.name: Deep Pockets
perks.description: Carried ammo capacity for primary and secondary weapons increased by 25%

perks.name: Wheatgrass
perks.description: Health increased by 25%

perks.name: Rifleman
perks.description: Start with ARK-103 Assault Rifle

perks.name: Green Fingered
perks.description: Your Claymores are rigged to explode only when there are at least 5 targets in the blast area. Start with Claymore

perks.name: Fire Trap
perks.description: Claymore explosions set fire to surrounding area. Start with Claymore

perks.name: Combat Engineer
perks.description: 20% chance to restore an expended Defense Kit. (10% for Horde Mode)

perks.name: Second Wind
perks.description: Instead of becoming incapacitated you will regain 25% health and keep going (cooldown 120 seconds)

perks.name: Job Satisfaction
perks.description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession grants temporary health boost (cooldown 30 seconds)

perks.name: Cloak and Dagger
perks.description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession grants masking effect for 3 seconds

perks.name: Hollywood II
perks.description: Explosives and fire damage dealt to yourself and your teammates reduced by 50%

perks.name: Know-How II
perks.description: Molotovs and Claymores can kill 10% more targets

perks.name: Broad Shoulders
perks.description: Heavy weapon ammo capacity increased by 25%

perks.name: Bullet Rain
perks.description: All fully automatic weapons' reload speed increased by 25%

perks.name: Third Hand
perks.description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession instantly reloads your primary weapon

perks.name: Party at my Place
perks.description: Maximum Molotov capacity increased to 3 and Claymore capacity to 4

perks.name: Pickpocket
perks.description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession refills one equipment charge (cooldown 60 seconds)

perks.name: Pocket Factory
perks.description: You won't be able to pick equipment bags on the mission but your equipment will be constantly regenerating (150 seconds to replenish to maximum)

perks.name: Know-How
perks.description: Molotovs and Claymores can kill 25% more targets

perks.name: Hot Sauce
perks.description: Molotov's splash damage increased by 100%

perks.name: Ghost
perks.description: Automatically receive masking effect if you are the last of your team still standing (does not apply if you are incapacitated or pinned)

perks.name: Daredevil
perks.description: When there are more than 30 zombies in the area, firearm damage is increased by 25% and number of melee strikes before becoming fatigued increased by 2

perks.name: Deep Pockets II
perks.description: Carried ammo capacity for primary weapons increased by 10%

classdata.name: Dronemaster
classdata.description: As the Dronemaster, command your Quadrocopter to follow you around, hold an area, or protect an ally, providing useful buffs!

perks.name: Flying Start
perks.description: Start with a Scout Rifle and Quadrocopter that will stun single zombies at short range. 12 shots per full charge but stunning a special zombie costs 5 shots

perks.name: Ammo Drop
perks.description: Person being followed regains 10% of primary ammo when Quadrocopter is depleted

perks.name: Go The Distance
perks.description: Quadrocopter charge (the number of stun shots or kills the Quadrocopter can perform) is increased by 15%

perks.name: Take a Load Off
perks.description: Quadrocopter's charge increased by 30%, but you carry 20% less ammo for primary and secondary weapons

perks.name: Longshot
perks.description: Quadrocopter's attack range increased by 100% (base: 2 meters for stun gun, 15 meters for pistol)

perks.name: Silent Stinger
perks.description: Your Quadrocopter will be equipped with a silenced pistol and will attack zombies in a 15 meter radius. 15 kills per full charge

perks.name: Firecracker
perks.description: Your Quadrocopter will be equipped with an unsilenced pistol and will attack zombies in a 15 meter radius. Shot damage increased by 100%. 15 kills per full charge

perks.name: Lightning Storm
perks.description: Your Quadrocopter's stun gun's fire rate is increased by 50%

perks.name: Overdrive
perks.description: Tapping "Use Equipment" button increases Quadrocopter's rate of fire by 100% for 6 seconds. It cannot be depleted during this time but will be depleted as soon as the effect is over

perks.name: Well Trained
perks.description: Tapping "Use Equipment" button toggles active Quadrocopter between "follow" and "stationary" modes. Quadrocopter damage in stationary mode increased by 50% (applies to both stun gun and handgun versions)

perks.name: The Big Five 0
perks.description: Start with improved BF25 Payload Rifle that deals 50% more damage and has 50% more ammo. All BF25 Payload Rifle pickups for you also improved [base: 6 ammo]

perks.name: Rechargeable
perks.description: Active Quadrocopter will passively restore its charge by 1% per seconds after 5 seconds from its last shot

perks.name: Unfettered
perks.description: Movement speed penalty when zombies are very close reduced by 50% for person followed by your Quadrocopter

perks.name: Burst Pro
perks.description: Reload speed of firearms with burst fire mode increased by 25%

perks.name: Wheatgrass
perks.description: Health increased by 25%

perks.name: Weapon of Choice
perks.description: Start with Le Clairon Bullpup Rifle

perks.name: Backup Plan
perks.description: When you are grabbed, if you have no Quadrocopter following you but have one in your inventory, a Quadrocopter will automatically be launched (cooldown 180 seconds)

perks.name: Parting Gift
perks.description: Receive small amount of temporary health when the Quadrocopter is depleted (applies to the person it's following)

perks.name: Saving Grace
perks.description: If a player followed by a Quadrocopter is hit and about to be incapacitated, the Quadrocopter will grant a masking effect for 6 seconds (cooldown 180 seconds)

perks.name: Pied Piper
perks.description: Holding "Use Equipment" button commands Quadrocopter to fly to the point you're aiming at. After it reaches that point it will attract zombies for 5 seconds and will then be depleted

perks.name: Sharing is Caring
perks.description: Holding "Use Equipment" button commands Quadrocopter to follow a teammate you're aiming at. You must have a spare Quadrocopter and you can't have more than two Quadrocopters active at the same time

perks.name: Coming in Hot
perks.description: Holding "Use Equipment" button commands Quadrocopter to fly to the point you're aiming at and explode there

perks.name: Payload Power-Up
perks.description: Quadrocopter equipped with stun gun can hit 2 targets per shot (base: 1) Each target hit carries a charge cost. Quadrocopter equipped with pistol deals 50% more damage

perks.name: Spotter
perks.description: Firearm damage increased by 15% for person followed by your Quadrocopter

perks.name: Housekeeping
perks.description: Quadrocopter automatically defuses enemy landmines and captures hostile automatic turrets in 10 meters radius

perks.name: Keep It Down
perks.description: Active Quadrocopter will automatically target the Screamer if he's not killed within 20 seconds after his first scream. Quadrocopter will be depleted after the Screamer is dead

perks.name: Eye In The Sky
perks.description: All active special zombies within a radius 14 meters around your Quadrocopter will be automatically marked

perks.name: Pocket Factory
perks.description: You won't be able to pick equipment bags on the mission but your equipment will be constantly regenerating (150 seconds to replenish to maximum)

perks.name: Flight of Fury
perks.description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession restores one Quadrocopter to your inventory (cooldown 180 seconds)

perks.name: Special Prize
perks.description: Killing a special zombie restores one Quadrocopter to your inventory (cooldown 180 seconds)

perks.name: Multitasking
perks.description: Automatically reload primary weapon on Quadrocopter launch

perks.name: Not On My Watch
perks.description: Friendly fire taken is decreased by 100% for person followed by your Quadrocopter

perks.name: Next Best Thing
perks.description: Start with Geist 17MP machine pistol as secondary weapon

perks.name: Out With A Bang
perks.description: Quadrocopter stuns up to 10 zombies in 5 meters radius when it is depleted (also applies for handgun version)

perks.name: Guardian Angel
perks.description: Person followed by your Quadrocopter will take 10% less damage

classdata.name: Vanguard
classdata.description: Vanguards wield a devastating electric shield that can punch a hole right through the zombie horde.

perks.name: Safeguard
perks.description: Start with Mobile Shield and M500 Shotgun. Take 100% less friendly fire damage while using Shield Charge or Blocking

perks.name: Peripheral Vision
perks.description: Increase angle at which attacks will be blocked by your Shield by 10% (base: 220 deg)

perks.name: Quick Hands
perks.description: Blocking zombie hit or performing Shield Charge reloads your primary and secondary weapons

perks.name: Adrenaline Rush
perks.description: Blocking zombie hit or performing Shield Charge fully restores melee stamina

perks.name: Fancy Footwork
perks.description: Better maneuverability when using Shield Charge and you can move 30% faster while blocking

perks.name: Passive Aggression
perks.description: Shield Block can withstand incoming hits for 3 more seconds (base: 5 seconds)

perks.name: All-Round Defense
perks.description: For the first 3 seconds Shield Block protects you from all directions

perks.name: Residual Defense
perks.description: Take 50% less damage from zombies for 3 seconds after Shield Block ends

perks.name: Conditioning
perks.description: You can perform 2 more Shield Charges per full shield energy (base: 2 charges)

perks.name: Recuperation
perks.description: You won't be able to collect equipment bags, but your Shield energy will constantly recharge (140 seconds to replenish to maximum)

perks.name: Pickpocket
perks.description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession refills one equipment charge (cooldown 30 seconds)

perks.name: Armor Plated
perks.description: You gain passive shield protection for 3 seconds when you start interacting with something (cooldown 10 sec)

perks.name: Steadfast
perks.description: All zombie damage is reduced by 25% when using Shield Block

perks.name: Stronger Together
perks.description: Health for you and all teammates increased by 7.5%

perks.name: Outer Shell
perks.description: When your health is below 30% incoming damage depletes Shield energy before health. Full Shield energy prevents damage up to 50% of health

perks.name: Juggernaut
perks.description: Health increased by 35% but sprint stamina decreased by 50%

perks.name: Rolling Refill
perks.description: Passing near an Ammo Crate during a Shield Charge automatically refills your ammo

perks.name: Magnet
perks.description: Restore 2% of primary weapon ammo for each enemy killed with a Shield Charge

perks.name: Supply Train
perks.description: Passing near a teammate during a Shield Charge reloads their primary weapon. You receive 5% ammo for your primary weapon for each teammate reloaded

perks.name: Freight Train
perks.description: You can kill 40% more zombies with a shield charge (base: 14 zombies)

perks.name: Shake It Off
perks.description: Performing a Shield Charge removes all negative effects received from special zombies

perks.name: Long Run
perks.description: Your Shield Charge speed and covered distance increased by 20%

perks.name: On Your Feet
perks.description: A single incapacitated teammate within 2 meters of where you finish a Shield Charge will get back up on their feet

perks.name: Secret Stash
perks.description: Carried ammo capacity for secondary weapons increased by 15%

perks.name: Elbow Room
perks.description: When you, or a teammate within 2 meters of you, starts reviving an incapacitated character, surrounding enemies will be pushed back (cooldown 60 seconds)

perks.name: Placebo Effect
perks.description: Heal 10% of max health when someone uses a medkit within 2 meters of you and you're not the target of healing

perks.name: Inspirational
perks.description: Killing 15 zombies in rapid succession while you are the only member of your team still standing respawns a randomly selected dead teammate (cooldown 60 seconds)

perks.name: Sturdy
perks.description: When your Shield Block is completely expended, you gain a temporary health boost (cooldown 60 sec)

perks.name: Hurry Back
perks.description: Respawn time for the whole team decreased by 15%

perks.name: Centre of Attention
perks.description: Activating Shield Block will force all zombies within 3 meters in front of you to target you instead of your teammates

perks.name: Trail Blazer
perks.description: Finishing a Shield Charge sets enemies in front of you on fire (distance 2 meters)

perks.name: You Made me Mad
perks.description: Melee attacks and firearms deal 50% more damage for 5 seconds after you holster the Shield

perks.name: Avenger
perks.description: Firearm damage increased by 20% for each dead or incapacitated teammate

perks.name: Breathing Room
perks.description: Automatically push back nearby zombies when you are hit and about to be incapacitated (cooldown 60 seconds)

perks.name: Linebacker
perks.description: Shield Charge allows you to run for an additional 1 seconds (base: 5 seconds)
